CLAUSTROPHOBIC.NAME: Claustrophobic
CLAUSTROPHOBIC.DESC: This Duplicant feels suffocated in spaces less than four tiles high or three tiles wide

FASHIONABLE.NAME: Fashionista
FASHIONABLE.DESC: This Duplicant dies a bit inside when forced to wear unstylish clothing

CLIMACOPHOBIC.NAME: Vertigo Prone
CLIMACOPHOBIC.DESC: Climbing ladders more than four tiles tall makes this Duplicant's stomach do flips

SOLITARYSLEEPER.NAME: Solitary Sleeper
SOLITARYSLEEPER.DESC: This Duplicant prefers to sleep alone

PREFERSWARMER.NAME: Skinny
PREFERSWARMER.DESC: This Duplicant doesn't have much insulation, so they are more temperature sensitive than others

PREFERSCOOLER.NAME: Pudgy
PREFERSCOOLER.DESC: This Duplicant has some extra insulation, so the room temperature affects them a little less

SENSITIVEFEET.NAME: Delicate Feetsies
SENSITIVEFEET.DESC: This Duplicant is a sensitive sole and would rather walk on tile than raw bedrock

WORKAHOLIC.NAME: Workaholic
WORKAHOLIC.DESC: This Duplicant gets antsy when left idle

CANTRESEARCH.NAME: Yokel
CANTRESEARCH.DESC: This Duplicant isn't the brightest star in the solar system

CANTBUILD.NAME: Unconstructive
CANTBUILD.DESC: This Duplicant is incapable of building even the most basic of structures

CANTCOOK.NAME: Gastrophobia
CANTCOOK.DESC: This Duplicant has a deep-seated distrust of the culinary arts

CANTDIG.NAME: Trypophobia
CANTDIG.DESC: This Duplicant's fear of holes makes it impossible for them to dig

HEMOPHOBIA.NAME: Squeamish
HEMOPHOBIA.DESC: This Duplicant is of delicate disposition and cannot tend to the sick

BEDSIDEMANNER.NAME: Caregiver
BEDSIDEMANNER.DESC: This Duplicant has good bedside manner and a healing touch

MOUTHBREATHER.NAME: Mouth Breather
MOUTHBREATHER.DESC: This Duplicant sucks up way more than their fair share of Oxygen

FUSSY.NAME: Fussy
FUSSY.DESC: Nothing's ever quite good enough for this Duplicant

TWINKLETOES.NAME: Twinkletoes
TWINKLETOES.DESC: This Duplicant is light as a feather on their feet

STRONGARM.NAME: Buff
STRONGARM.DESC: This Duplicant has muscles on their muscles

NOODLEARMS.NAME: Noodle Arms
NOODLEARMS.DESC: This Duplicant's arms have all the tensile strength of overcooked linguine

AGGRESSIVE.NAME: Destructive
AGGRESSIVE.DESC: This Duplicant handles stress by taking their frustrations out on defenseless machines

UGLYCRIER.NAME: Ugly Crier
UGLYCRIER.DESC: If this Duplicant gets too stressed it won't be pretty

BINGEEATER.NAME: Binge Eater
BINGEEATER.DESC: This Duplicant will dangerously overeat when stressed

ANXIOUS.NAME: Anxious
ANXIOUS.DESC: This Duplicant collapses when put under too much pressure

STRESSVOMITER.NAME: Vomiter
STRESSVOMITER.DESC: This Duplicant is liable to puke everywhere when stressed

IRONGUT.NAME: Iron Gut
IRONGUT.DESC: This Duplicant can eat just about anything without getting sick

STRONGIMMUNESYSTEM.NAME: Germ Resistant
STRONGIMMUNESYSTEM.DESC: This Duplicant's immune system bounces back faster than most

ALLERGIES.NAME: Allergies
ALLERGIES.DESC: This Duplicant will sneeze uncontrollably when exposed to the pollen present in Floral Scent

WEAKIMMUNESYSTEM.NAME: Biohazardous
WEAKIMMUNESYSTEM.DESC: All the vitamin C in space couldn't stop this Duplicant from getting sick

IRRITABLEBOWEL.NAME: Irritable Bowel
IRRITABLEBOWEL.DESC: This Duplicant needs a little extra time to "do their business"

CALORIEBURNER.NAME: Bottomless Stomach
CALORIEBURNER.DESC: This Duplicant might actually be several black holes in a trench coat

SMALLBLADDER.NAME: Small Bladder
SMALLBLADDER.DESC: This Duplicant has a tiny, pea-sized bladder. Adorable!

ANEMIC.NAME: Anemic
ANEMIC.DESC: This Duplicant has trouble keeping up with the others

GREASEMONKEY.NAME: Grease Monkey
GREASEMONKEY.DESC: This Duplicant likes to throw a wrench into the colony's plans... in a good way

MOLEHANDS.NAME: Mole Hands
MOLEHANDS.DESC: They're great for tunneling, but finding good gloves is a nightmare

FASTLEARNER.NAME: Quick Learner
FASTLEARNER.DESC: This Duplicant's sharp as a tack and learns new skills with amazing speed

SLOWLEARNER.NAME: Slow Learner
SLOWLEARNER.DESC: This Duplicant's a little slow on the uptake, but gosh do they try

DIVERSLUNG.NAME: Diver's Lungs
DIVERSLUNG.DESC: This Duplicant could have been a talented opera singer in another life

FLATULENCE.NAME: Flatulent
FLATULENCE.DESC: Some Duplicants are just full of it

SNORER.NAME: Loud Sleeper
SNORER.DESC: In space, everyone can hear you snore

NARCOLEPSY.NAME: Narcoleptic
NARCOLEPSY.DESC: This Duplicant can and will fall asleep anytime, anyplace

INTERIORDECORATOR.NAME: Interior Decorator
INTERIORDECORATOR.DESC: "Move it a little to the left..."

UNCULTURED.NAME: Uncultured
UNCULTURED.DESC: This Duplicant has simply no appreciation for the arts

ARCHAEOLOGIST.NAME: Archeologist
ARCHAEOLOGIST.DESC: This Duplicant will always bring back an artifact from space expeditions.

EARLYBIRD.NAME: Early Bird
EARLYBIRD.DESC: This Duplicant always wakes up feeling fresh and efficient!

NIGHTOWL.NAME: Night Owl
NIGHTOWL.DESC: This Duplicant does their best work when they'd ought to be sleeping

REGENERATION.NAME: Regenerative
REGENERATION.DESC: This Duplicant is constantly regenerating health.

DEEPERDIVERSLUNGS.NAME: Deeper Diver's Lungs
DEEPERDIVERSLUNGS.DESC: This Duplicant was a talented opera singer and a snorkeling instructor.

SUNNYDISPOSITION.NAME: Sunny Disposition
SUNNYDISPOSITION.DESC: This Duplicant has an unwaveringly positive outlook on life.

SIMPLETASTES.NAME: Simple Tastes
SIMPLETASTES.DESC: This Duplicant finds pleasure in even the blandest of foods.

FOODIE.NAME: Gourmet
FOODIE.DESC: This Duplicant has a highly refined palate and desires luxurious foods.

Machinery.NAME: Tinkering
Machinery.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant uses machines.

LifeSupport.NAME: Life Support
LifeSupport.DESC: Determines how efficiently a Duplicant maintains algae terrariums, deodorizers, and water sieves.

Toggle.NAME: Toggle
Toggle.DESC: Determines how efficiently a Duplicant tunes machinery, flips switches, and sets sensors.

Learning.NAME: Learning
Learning.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant conducts Research and gains skills.

Cooking.NAME: Cooking
Cooking.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant prepares Food.

Strength.NAME: Strength
Strength.DESC: Determines a Duplicant's carrying capacity and cleaning speed.

Caring.NAME: Kindness
Caring.DESC: Determines medical skill and sociability with peers and critters.

Immunity.NAME: Immunity
Immunity.DESC: Determines a Duplicant's disease susceptibility and recovery time.

Botanist.NAME: Farming
Botanist.DESC: Determines how quickly and efficiently a Duplicant cultivates plants.

Ranching.NAME: Ranching
Ranching.DESC: Determines how quickly and efficiently a Duplicant tends critters.

Art.NAME: Creativity
Art.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant can produce artwork.

Decor.NAME: Decor
Decor.DESC: Decor affects a Duplicant's Stress and their opinion of their surroundings.
